resources.string: To receive a broadcast notification: right-click the PushAdapter folder in the Studio and select \"Run As > Call MobileFirst Adapter\"; Select the \"sendBroadcastNotification\" procedure and provide the notification text in quotation marks, for example: \"test notification\".

To receive a notification for a specific tag: first subscribe to a tag below, then right-click the PushAdapter folder in the Studio and select \"Run As > Call MobileFirst Adapter\"; Select the \"sendTagNotification\" procedure and provide the notification text and tag name in quotation marks, for example: \"test notification\",\"sample-tag1\" or to notify multiple tags: \"test notification\", \"sample-tag1,sample-tag2\".
